--- layout: default title: about ---

Umar Faruk Abdullahi

Builder. Researcher. Explorer.

I am currently a masters student @EDISS focusing on AI and ML, sponsored by the EU's Erasmus Mundus Program. During my studies, I've worked on machine learning research projects in bioinformatics @Turku Bioscience, computer vision @AILiveSim and RL for network slicing @Fingletek . Prior to this, I worked as a Software Engineer (Backend + Cloud) @Mercurie. I am passionate about deeply understanding how things work and enjoy the process of learning new technologies that I can apply to create new solutions and solve problems.
I also write [occassionally] on Substack on my topics of interest. Feel free to reach out for anything!


Picture: With The Cyclist robot at the Deutsches Museum in Munich.
